params._amount: Amount of tokens to deposit into the prize pool
params._prizePool: Address of the prize pool to deposit into

devdoc.title: Allows users to approve and deposit EIP-2612 compatible tokens into a prize pool in a single transaction.

depositToAndDelegate(address,uint256,add.notice: Deposits user's token into the prize pool and delegate tickets.

permitAndDepositToAndDelegate(address,ui.notice: Permits this contract to spend on a user's behalf and deposits into the prize pool.
